newsitem.title: USA: PanAmSat to provide capacity to Formosa TV.
newsitem.headline: PanAmSat to provide capacity to Formosa TV.

text.p: PanAmSat Corp on Wednesday said it was providing satellite capacity to Taiwan's newest television operator, Formosa TV.
The company said Formosa TV would use capacity on PanAmSat's PAS-2 Pacific Ocean Region satellite to launch two free-to-air channels for viewing by cable and non-cable households across Taiwan.
"This means smaller dishes at user sites and thus greater access to the more than 100 licensed cable headends throughout Taiwan," a statement from PanAmSat said.

PanAmSat said the first of Formosa TV's two new channels was primarily devoted to news and has already begun broadcasting. It said the second channel is scheduled to begin broadcasting general-interest programming in June.
